00011 /****************************************************************************
00012  * Public function implemenations
00013  ****************************************************************************/
00014 inline int
00015 arrow_util_create_int_array(int size, int **array)
00016 {
00017     if((*array = malloc(size * sizeof(int))) == NULL)
00018     {
00019         arrow_print_error("Error allocating memory for int array.");
00020         array = NULL;
00021         return ARROW_ERROR_FATAL;
00022     }
00023     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00024 }
00025 
00026 inline void
00027 arrow_util_print_error(const char *file_name, int line_num,
00028                        const char *message)
00029 {
00030     fprintf(stderr, "%s:%d: %s", file_name, line_num, message);
00031 }
00032 
00033 inline double
00034 arrow_util_zeit()
00035 {
00036     return CCutil_zeit();
00037 }
00038 
00039 void
00040 arrow_util_redirect_stdout_to_file(const char *filename, int *old_stream)
00041 {
00042     fpos_t pos;
00043     fgetpos(stdout, &pos);
00044     *old_stream = dup(fileno(stdout));
00045     freopen(filename, "w", stdout);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void
00049 arrow_util_restore_stdout(int old_stream)
00050 {
00051     fpos_t pos;
00052     fflush(stdout);
00053     dup2(old_stream, fileno(stdout));
00054     close(old_stream);
00055     clearerr(stdout);
00056     fsetpos(stdout, &pos); /* for C9X */
00057 }
